description: Number of n X n matrices over GF(4) of order dividing 7 (i.e. number of solutions of X^7=I in GL(n,4)).
references: V. Jovovic, The cycle index polynomials of some classical groups, Belgrade, 1995, unpublished.
links: Kent E. Morrison, Integer Sequences and Matrices Over Finite Fields, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 9 (2006), Article 06.2.1.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Mar 28 2000
